scene_description: the speaker makes a joke about a woman who has only seen one penis saying that 78 days is a long campaign, implying that she has no basis for comparison.
the speaker makes a joke about a three-way, a sex act, and compares it to the canadian three-way election, where three parties are competing.
the speaker makes a joke about an ndp candidate who didn't know what auschwitz was and also didn't know what a penis looks like, implying that she is ignorant in multiple ways.
